reviewText: I wonder why all Cirque du Soleil DVDs are not aveliable around the world. They should be. It would be much easier.
This DVD made my collection complete! I ordered and got it quick, it was carefully packed, and brand new. Thank you.

Unfortunately ZED is just one of too many examples of Cirque shows which are no longer playing but for which Cirque made a conscious decision to NOT record on video. I know this because because I asked and that was the response. I treasure the DVDs I do have of earlier touring shows, and have to "settle" for those no longer in existence but which have snippets on YOUTUBE. I would rather have purchased a Cirque produced DVD.

This is simply amazing.
Superb music. Wonderful photography. Great behind the scenes story of ZED that I really wanted to know. A rare insider's view of Cirque Du Soleil. Simply one of the best movies I've seen.
